title: I hate to spoil Prince Harry's message - but should we really refer to people as 'gingers'?
text:
Prince Harry and Ed Sheeran this week filmedan amusing little vignette for charity.

Its comedy – all comedy, in fact – derives from a misunderstanding, and in this case Harry wants to talk about World Mental Health Day, while Ed thinks they are joining forces to combat discrimination against “gingers”. Ed eventually realises his mistake and hastily deletes his manifesto from the laptop screen.

But I’m quite sad about that, because the singer-songwriter has a point. Poking fun at red hair has become the last redoubt of prejudice.

I hate the very G-word, as does my husband, who has the colouring of a Viking, but mercifully not the bedside manner.

He is Scottish. I come from Ireland. In both places,...
